div.style: display: inline-block; background-color: #d9e0e7; padding: 6px; margin: 4px; border: 1px solid #8da1b4; border-radius: 5px; line-height: 60%
div.p: Profiles: CRMI Shareable StructureDefinition, CRMI Publishable StructureDefinition

table.style: border: 0px #F0F0F0 solid; font-size: 11px; font-family: verdana; vertical-align: top;

description.value: Data elements for the IMMZ.D21.Generate verifiable digital certificate Data Dictionary Activity.

definition.value: Data elements for the IMMZ.D21.Generate verifiable digital certificate Data Dictionary Activity.
The authority or authorized organization that issued the vaccination certificate
Unique identifier used to associate the immunization event represented in a paper vaccination card to its digital representation(s)
Date in which the certificate for an immunization event became valid. No health or clinical inferences should be made from this date
Last date in which the certificate for an immunization event is valid. No health or clinical inferences should be made from this date
Version of the core data set and HL7 Fast Health Interoperability Resources (FHIR) implementation guide that the certificate is using

The authority or authorized organization that issued the vaccination certificate
Unique identifier used to associate the immunization event represented in a paper vaccination card to its digital representation(s)
Date in which the certificate for an immunization event became valid. No health or clinical inferences should be made from this date
Last date in which the certificate for an immunization event is valid. No health or clinical inferences should be made from this date
Version of the core data set and HL7 Fast Health Interoperability Resources (FHIR) implementation guide that the certificate is using
